suddenness: The situation was sudden or abrupt.

predictability_of_event: The occurrence of the situation is predictable.

unpredictability_of_event: The occurrence of the situation is unpredictable.

goal_incongruence: The outcome is not aligned with personal goals/desires.

predictability_of_consequences: Consequences of the situation are easily anticipated.

unpredictability_of_consequences: Consequences of the situation are not anticipated.

self_cause: The situation was caused by the character themselves.

other_cause: The situation was caused by chance or others.

self_control: The character has control over what is going on in the situation.

other_control: Someone other than the character has control over what is going on in the situation.

norm_violation: The actions that produced the situation violated the character's standards and ideals.

coping_demand: The situation requires a great deal of energy to cope with it.

unacceptable_consequences: Consequences of the situation are unbearable.
